item.title: Plant watering system
item.description: Introduction This project is meant to keep my plants healthy while I go on vacations. Part 1 - Prototype Parts required Raspberry Pi Zero (will work with any Raspberry Pi) micro usb power supply 3v-5v pump small hose for the pump 5v relay wires Wiring diagram Relay inputs: NO = normally opened NC = normally closed CO = common DC- = ground DC+ = 5V signal IN = signal Code Simple python code to send a signal to pin 8 for 0.
